model

Class Planner

  • java.lang.Object
    • model.Planner

  • public class Planner
extends java.lang.Object
    The planner manages planning algorithms.

    Created by Daniel Riissanen on 16.3.2018.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Planner()
      Class constructor using the default algorithm utilities.
      Planner(AlgorithmUtils utilities)
      Class constructor specifying an algorithm utility class to use.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addAlgorithm(java.lang.String name, PlanningAlgorithm algorithm)
      Maps a name to a planning algorithm.
      void formulateAllPlans(State start, Goal goal, Action[] actions)
      Calls the algorithm in use to formulate all valid plans.
      java.lang.String getAlgorithmName()
      Returns the name of the algorithm in use.
      java.lang.String[] getAlgorithmNames()
      Returns a list of all names of all the algorithms that the planner knows of.
      AlgorithmUtils getAlgorithmUtils() 
      Plan[] getAllPlans() 
      Plan getBestPlan()
      Returns the best plan that the algorithm in use can find.
      void useAlgorithm(java.lang.String name)
      If an algorithm with the name exists, use it for the next formulateAllPlans(State, Goal, Action[]).

      • formulateAllPlans

        public void formulateAllPlans(State start,
                              Goal goal,
                              Action[] actions)
        Calls the algorithm in use to formulate all valid plans.
        Parameters:
        start - The start state
        goal - The goal
        actions - The actions available for use
